MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the SY16 postcode area of Kerry, affecting properties in Chestnut View and surrounding area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11am due to faulty transformer. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12noon. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.07am on 29th of April 2021.
